Name: Cherrute
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of pink grapefruit zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and discarded.
Review: Sweet cherry brandy balanced by the fruity acidity of grapefruit, laced with vodka.
History: Created in the early Noughties by Nicholas P J Snape at Mojo in Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cherrute contains 203 calories
